column3: News;Kampot: The Bureau of Investigation and Procedure received information from a landlord on the morning of February 25
column5: that a foreigner had died  in Andong Khmer Commune
column6: Kampot City.------Police said the body was identified as BARBARA NETTLESHIP
column7: reported to be a 100-year-old British woman.------At present
column8: the body is being kept at Wat Sovann Sakor
column10: with the consent of the British embassy.------Source
